N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 346.7 - Separation of functions

State Regulations
(a) No person involved in the collection of
cash receipts shall participate in the accounting, disbursement or
administration thereof. (b) (1)

Waivers of this requirement shall be
requested of the OCSE in writing, showing in detail the reasons the additional
staff would be unreasonable and providing an alternate system of controls that
reasonably insures that child support collections will not be misused. Each
such request shall include a listing of all agency staff, showing their
responsibilities. (2)

After receipt
and review by the NYS Office of Child Support Enforcement, each approved
request shall be transmitted to the Federal Office of Child Support Enforcement
for consideration in accordance with applicable Federal law and
regulations. (3)

No such plan shall
be put into operation until approval therefor has been received by the district
in writing. Notes
